name: Where are you ?
description:
"My name is Emily. I woke up in those catacombs with no memories. Where are you? And how do we get out of here?"

You follow Emily, lost in the Parisian catacombs, searching for someone she cares about. Solving riddles & puzzles at each level will help you to collect clues to understand why she is trapped here and why the beloved one is not with her. 

 The game lasts about an hour and was created for a slow game jam "I can't write but I want to tell a story" by our team, with a major theme "Lost".  Our assets were created during this jam.

It was the first game jam for some of us.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
